parameters.name: JobId
parameters.description: The job ID. For more information about how to obtain a job ID, see [ListJobs](~~459676~~).

parameters.name: SanityCheckNumber
parameters.description: The nth time for which the job sanity check is performed.

parameters.name: SanityCheckPhase
parameters.description:
The phase in which the job sanity check is performed.

*   CheckInit
*   DeviceCheck
*   SingleNodeCommCheck
*   TwoNodeCommCheck
*   AllNodeCommCheck

parameters.name: Token
parameters.description: The token information for job sharing. For more information about how to obtain the token information, see [GetToken](~~2557812~~).
